patch.name: patch
patch.title: CiviCRM Security Patch Needed
patch.message:
The site is running 5.19.2. Additional patches are available:

  • 5.19.3 (2019-11-25): Fix recent regression involving wp-cli and CiviMail hyperlinks.
  • 5.19.4 (security) (2019-12-04): Fix security issues CIVI-SA-2019-24. Fix recent regressions.

upgrade.name: upgrade
upgrade.title: CiviCRM Upgrade Available
upgrade.message:
5.20.0 was released on 2019-12-04. The latest patch revision is 5.20.3 (2019-12-28).
5.21.0 was released on 2019-01-01. The latest patch revision is 5.21.1 (2019-01-10).
